name: Rabbice
description:
Run throw the ice maze and help to little rabbit to find all his carrots. Avoid traps or any other danger on the ice. There is plenty of levels for you and much more is coming soon.

This is originally a game for Android. This WebGL version is not redesigned for playing on pc as it should be.


[How to play]
- swipe mouse for change direction or use the arrow keys
- don't fall from the ice

[What is the goal]
- find all carrots if you can
- find a grass platform in each level to open a new level
- in endless mode run as long as you can and collect so many carrots as you can
- challenge your friends
